name: S.T.O.R.K.
description:
S.T.O.R.K. MASSIVE EPILEPSY WARNING

Made for the Secret Santa game jam. My giftee will not be disclosed until after the jam ends.

S.T.O.R.K. is a game where you go around in a Stork-shaped spaceship shooting some guys until you win the game. That's it.

Story? I made it up just now as I was writing this description!

"You have heard from your mission statement that the evil group known as Crow has stolen the plans to the F-802 prototype and plans to use it to destroy Japan. To combat this, you must fly into the heart of evil with a prototype of your own: the powerful starship S.T.O.R.K. (Star Travel Operative Recon K-001). You must traverse alien planets to find the two bases housing the generators and plans for the F-802! Now... you must be ready for takeoff!"
